title: How do you lane against a good Xerath?
body: I don't normally play assassins, cause a good xerath will probably not allow the assassin to get in his range, and prob poke his ass before he has the gap closer. Do you think Vel'Koz, Ziggs, and Twisted Fate are good mid champions who can deal with Xerath poke, as they are also good pokes? How about Lux, Anivia, Karma, Gragas?
